casebody.data:
2001-3062 (La. 10/25/02)

STATE of Louisiana v. Jimmy SPRINKLE. No. 2001-KO-3062. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 25, 2002.

In re Sprinkle, Jimmy; — Defendant; Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review, Parish of Jefferson, 24th Judicial District Court Div. E, No. 99-4313; to the Court of Appeal, Fifth Circuit, No. 01-KA-137.

Denied.
